title-part.text: MEASURING TEMPERATURE
MEASURING QUANTITY OF HEAT
THERMALLY-SENSITIVE ELEMENTS NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated : "thermometer" includes thermally-sensitive elements not provided for in other subclasses.
Attention is drawn to the Notes following the title of class G01.
Attention is drawn to the Notes following the titles of class B81 and subclass B81B relating to "microstructural devices" and "microstructural systems".
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.
